titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Russell Gerard Davis Papers, 1949-1988
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1998 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Russell Gerard Davis Papers,
did.abstract: Studies, reports, statistics, and memoranda, relating to education and economic development in underdeveloped countries.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Russell Gerard Davis Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1981.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

controlaccess.head: Access Points
controlaccess.corpname: United States. Agency for International Development.
controlaccess.subject: Education.
Developing countries.
Education--Developing countries.

chronitem.event: Education adviser, U.S. Agency for International Development, Ethiopia
Professor of education and development, Harvard University
Author, Build a Mill, Build a City, Build a School

did.unittitle: Projected Monographs.

scopecontent.p: Drafts of projected monographs by Russell G. Davis and others, relating to education planning and development in underdeveloped countries, 1977-1979. Arranged alphabetically by author or editor.

did.unittitle: Country Reports.

scopecontent.p: Reports by Russell G. Davis and others, relating to education planning and development in specific countries, 1967-1980. Arranged alphabetically by country.

did.unittitle: General Reports.

scopecontent.p: Reports by Russell G. Davis and others, relating to education planning and development in general, 1969-1980. Arranged alphabetically by author.

did.unittitle: Miscellany.

scopecontent.p: Fragments of unidentified writings, and supporting materials for unidentified writings. Arranged alphabetically by form.

did.unittitle: Card File.

scopecontent.p: Index card bibliographies and supporting materials for unidentified writings. Unarranged.
